description: Build a Todo web application using custom Docker images (Nginx, PHP, MySQL) running in Docker-in-Docker

userStories.title: Create MySQL Docker image and schema
userStories.description: Build custom MySQL Docker image with initialization script for todos table
acceptanceCriteria: Create todo-app/docker/mysql/init.sql with todos table (id, text, completed, created_at)
Build image with docker_build tool as 'todoapp-mysql:latest'

userStories.title: Create PHP-FPM Docker image
userStories.description: Build custom PHP-FPM Docker image with mysqli extension
acceptanceCriteria: Build image with docker_build tool as 'todoapp-php:latest'

userStories.title: Create Nginx Docker image
userStories.description: Build custom Nginx Docker image with PHP-FPM configuration
acceptanceCriteria: Create todo-app/docker/nginx/nginx.conf with PHP-FPM upstream config
Configure to serve from /var/www/html and proxy .php to php container
Build image with docker_build tool as 'todoapp-nginx:latest'

userStories.title: Create docker-compose and PHP backend
userStories.description: Create docker-compose.yml and PHP API for CRUD operations
acceptanceCriteria: Create todo-app/docker-compose.yml connecting all three services
Create todo-app/src/api.php with GET/POST/PUT/DELETE handlers for todos

userStories.title: Create frontend HTML/CSS/JS
userStories.description: Create the frontend user interface for the Todo app
acceptanceCriteria: Create todo-app/src/index.html with todo list UI
Create todo-app/src/app.js with fetch calls to api.php
Support add, toggle complete, and delete operations

userStories.title: Integration test in DinD
userStories.description: Run full integration test of the Todo app in Docker
acceptanceCriteria: Wait for MySQL to be ready
Test API endpoints with curl (create, list, update, delete todo)
Create README.md with docker-compose up instructions
